str2: A little child. Diminutive of teknon; an infant, i.e. darlings.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To lead astray, deceive, cause to wander. From plane; to roam.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
From dike; equitable; by implication, innocent, holy.
According to the manner in which, in the degree that, just as, as. From kata and hos; just as, that.
That, that one there, yonder. From ekei; that one (neuter) thing); often intensified by the article prefixed.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
From dike; equitable; by implication, innocent, holy.
